resources.string: Are you tired? Overloaded with information, strangled with threads. Need a break with your phone?
Instead of replacing one info overload with another, exercise your logical lobe with this perceptual quiz.
Take a break to enjoy the soothing patterns and colors, but be also wary of captious questions and stay focus. And then you are ready to go back to what you stopped doing.
Which square is part of the bigger picture? Scroll down.
Did you see any black\'n\'white pattern here? Don\'t look up!
What is round with cheese-like pattern?
It\'s not about the result, it\'s about taking a break to relax. See you again soon.
